ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Gorenaire
ygData.msgSnippet: Few Things to remember about Gore.. 1. Get 10+ nukers 54+, Mages, Druids, Wizards, heck even necros nukes and life taps should stack. 2. Shammy,
ygData.messageBody:
Few Things to remember about Gore..

1. Get 10+ nukers 54+, Mages, Druids, Wizards, heck even necros nukes and
life taps should stack.
2. Shammy, Enchanter,Bard, Druid to lower resists to the max. (Malo, Tash,
Occlusion, Ro together should take FR down so far that a lvl 54+ could nuke
with Fire based DD)
3. At least 2 Lvl 60ish tanks to take hits and taunt while rest of the ppl
nuke.
4. Bards go in caster groups to keep them from running(fear) Bards shoudl
twist Guardian + Elemental old school style, Send in nukers when Melee (even
slowed melee) has her down to 65% or so.


-Sebasttian

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Friday, November 30, 2001 12:29 AM
To: EQ Bards
Subject: [eqbards] Gorenaire


Hello all - I just got back from a two week tour of Germany with my band.
Before I left we camped Ragefire for a cleric's epic - and he dropped a red
scale that my guild defaulted to me.

Tonight we tried Gorenaire and got wiped twice. That damn fear doesn't seem
to care what your resistance is <sigh> got her down to 50 percent the second
try.

Anywho - any advice from people who've had success with this sucker?

Thanks!

Slyde
